resources.string: Including technical as well as cultural
An experience you will never forget
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data

Blitzschlag is the annual techno-cultural festival organised by MNIT Jaipur where various kinds of events are organised for students to showcase their talent and also various workshops to train students some useful stuff and ofcourse some celebrity nights and cultural shows for fun and rejuvenation.
To organise your event and for more queries:\n+91-7073790277\nanjnerajat@gmail.com

Blitzschlag ia an app providing all Blitzschlag fest related information to the users through a customied User Interface which fetches data from the server thus always providing latest updates of the venue, time and details of the events. Includes other necessities such as accommodation details, teaser video, recent event gallery, sponsors of the fest and also provides user an option to remember or add an event/workshop/lecture to wishlist thus whenever needed user can access the information without having any internet connection.
Rajat Anjne, the developer of Blitzschlag app is a third year B.Tech student of Computer Science and Engineering from MNIT Jaipur
